text.div:
ddcc

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://worldhealthorganization.github.io/ddcc/ImplementationGuide/fhir.who.ddcc

This WHO Digital Documentation of COVID-19 Certificates (DDCC) Implementation Guide details how to use Health Level 7 (HL7) Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIR) for consistent digital representation of COVID-19 certificates and interoperability.

name: ddcc
title: WHO Digital Documentation of COVID-19 Certificates (DDCC)
description: This WHO Digital Documentation of COVID-19 Certificates (DDCC) Implementation Guide details how to use Health Level 7 (HL7) Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIR) for consistent digital representation of COVID-19 certificates and interoperability.

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology

resource.name: DDCC Composition
resource.description:
Describes the logical structure for a Digital Documentation of COVID-19 Certificates 
(DDCC).

resource.name: DDCC Diagnostic Report
resource.description:
A DDCC Diagnostic Report contains the content corresponding to a row in the Test 
Events section of a Paper DDCC. While this is not a further profile of the International
Patient Summary (IPS) DiagnosticReport resouce, this is intended to map into an IPS 
DiagnosticReport resource.

resource.name: DDCC Document
resource.description: A [DDCC Document](StructureDefinition-DDCCDocument.html) is a document bundle containing the DDCC.

resource.name: DDCC Document Reference
resource.description:
A [DDCC Document Reference](StructureDefinition-DDCCDocumentReference.html) is a 
document reference to a [DDCC Document](StructureDefinition-DDCCDocument.html) 
containing the DDCC.
The content attachment url will point to a DDCC Document.

resource.name: DDCC DocumentReference return for QR
resource.description: DDCC DocumentReference for QR codes including the QR image and the serialized content.

resource.name: DDCC DocumentSigned
resource.description:
A [DDCC Document Signed](StructureDefinition-DDCCDocumentSigned.html) is a document bundle containing the DDCC
that has a digital signature.

resource.name: DDCC Folder
resource.description: DDCC Folder of the Paper Certificate

resource.name: DDCC Generate Health Certificate Parameters
resource.description: Parameters for the [DDCC Generate Health Certificate Operation](OperationDefinition-DDCC-QuestionnaireResponse-generateHealthCertificate.html).

resource.name: DDCC Generate Health Folder Parameters
resource.description: Parameters for the [DDCC Generate Health Folder Operation](OperationDefinition-DDCC-QuestionnaireResponse-generateHealthFolder.html).

resource.name: DDCC Immunization
resource.description:
A DDCC Immunization contains the content corresponding to a row in the Vaccination 
Events section of a Paper DDCC. While this is not a further profile of the International
Patient Summary (IPS) Immunization resouce, this is intended to map into an IPS 
Immunization resource.

resource.name: DDCC Immunization Recommendation
resource.description:
A DDCC Immunization Recommendation contains the content corresponding to when
a patient should return for a booster shot.

resource.name: DDCC Observation
resource.description:
A DDCC Observation contains the content corresponding to a row in the Test 
Events section of a Paper DDCC. While this is not a further profile of the International
Patient Summary (IPS) Observation resouce, this is intended to map into an IPS 
Observation resource.

resource.name: DDCC Organization
resource.description:
Abstraction for a DDCC Organization. There should be a DDCC Organization associated 
to each public health authortiy (PHA)

resource.name: DDCC Patient
resource.description:
A DDCCPatient should:
* if the [identifier.assigner](StructureDefinition-DDCCPatient-definitions.html#Patient.identifier] is set then the value of [identifier.assigner](StructureDefinition-DDCCPatient-definitions.html#Patient.identifier.assigner) should be set to reference the [DDCC Organization](StructureDefinition-DDCCOrganization.html) resource associated to the PHA.
* obeys who-ddcc-patient-1

resource.name: DDCC Practitioner
resource.description:
Container for an DDCC Practitioner, which is a Practitioner authorized by the PHA to 
vaccinate an [DDCC Patient](StructureDefinition-DDCCPatient.html).

resource.name: DDCC Practitioner Role
resource.description:
Association of an [DDCC Practitioner](StructureDefinition-DDCCPractitioner.html) to a 
managing [DDCC Organization](StructureDefinition-DDCCOrganization.html), indicating 
that an DDCC Practitioner is authorized by the public health authority (PHA) to 
vaccinate an [DDCC Patient](StructureDefinition-DDCCPatient.html).

resource.name: DDCC Procedure
resource.description:
A DDCC Procedure contains the content corresponding to a row in the Test 
Events section of a Paper DDCC. While this is not a further profile of the International
Patient Summary (IPS) Procedure resouce, this is intended to map into an IPS 
Procedure resource.

resource.name: DDCC Provide Document Bundle
resource.description: DDCC Provide Document Bundle for ITI-65

resource.name: DDCC Questionniare
resource.description: Describes the logical structure for a questionnaire associacted to a DDCC which includes a Structure Map to generate the relevant DDCC from a given [DDCC QuestionnaireResponse](StructureDefinition-DDCCQuestionnaireResponse.html) which responds to the DDCC Questionnaire.

resource.name: DDCC Questionnaire Response
resource.description: Describes the logical structure for a questionnaire response associacted to a [DDCC Questionaire](StructureDefinition-DDCCQuestionnaire.html).

resource.name: DDCC Questionnaire based on SDC
resource.description: DDCC Questionniare based on SDC Populatable Questionnaire with additional extension

resource.name: DDCC Revoke Health Certificate Parameters
resource.description: Parameters for the [DDCC Revoke Health Certificate Operation](OperationDefinition-DDCC-QuestionnaireResponse-revokeHealthCertificate.html).

resource.name: DDCC Specimen
resource.description:
A DDCC Specimen contains the content corresponding to a row in the Test 
Events section of a Paper DDCC. While this is not a further profile of the International
Patient Summary (IPS) Specimen resouce, this is intended to map into an IPS 
Specimen resource.

resource.name: DDCC Submission Set
resource.description: DDCC Submission Set for ITI-65

resource.name: DDCC Submit Health Event Request
resource.description: An [DDCC Submit Health Event Request](StructureDefinition-DDCCSubmitHealthEventRequest.html) is a transaction bundle containing the content of health events which are being submitted under the [Submit Health Event](transactions.html#submit-health-event) transaction.

resource.name: DDCC Submit Health Event Response
resource.description: A DDCC Submit Health Event Response](StructureDefinition-DDCCSubmitHealthEventRespose.html) is a transaction reponse bundle containing the operation outcomes for the submission of one or more health certificates under the [Submit Health Event](transactions.html#submit-health-event) transaction.

resource.name: DDCC:TR Composition
resource.description:
Describes the logical structure for a Digital Documentation of COVID-19 Certificates - Test Result
(DDCC:TR).

resource.name: DDCC:VS Document
resource.description: A [DDCC:VS Document](StructureDefinition-DDCCVSDocument.html) is a document bundle containing the DDCC:VS.

resource.name: DDCC:TR DocumentSigned
resource.description:
A [DDCC:TR Document Signed](StructureDefinition-DDCCTRDocumentSigned.html) is a document bundle containing the DDCC:TR
that has a digital signature.

resource.name: DDCC Test
resource.description:
A DDCC Test contains the content corresponding to a row in the Test 
Events section of a Paper DDCC. While this is not a further profile of the International
Patient Summary (IPS) Device resouce, this is intended to map into an IPS 
Device resource.

resource.name: DDCC:VS Add Bundle
resource.description:
Bundle to be transformed to from the DDCC:VS QuestionnaireResponse
to add on the DDCC generator.

resource.name: DDCC:VS Composition
resource.description:
Describes the logical structure for a Digital Documentation of COVID-19 Certificates - Vaccination Status
(DDCC:VS).

resource.name: DDCC:VS Document
resource.description: A [DDCC:VS Document](StructureDefinition-DDCCVSDocument.html) is a document bundle containing the DDCC:VS.

resource.name: DDCC:VS DocumentSigned
resource.description:
A [DDCC:VS Document Signed](StructureDefinition-DDCCVSDocumentSigned.html) is a document bundle containing the DDCC:VS
that has a digital signature.

resource.name: Immunization (IPS)
resource.description:
This profile represents the constraints applied to the Immunization resource by the International Patient Summary (IPS) FHIR Implementation Guide. A record of an immunization is represented in the patient summary as an instance of an Immunization resource constrained by this profile.

It describes the event of a patient being administered a vaccination or a record of a vaccination as reported by a patient, a clinician or another party.

resource.name: Patient (IPS)
resource.description: This profile represents the constraints applied to the Patient resource by the International Patient Summary (IPS) FHIR Implementation Guide and describes the minimum expectations for the Patient resource when used in the IPS composition or in one of the referred resources.
